removeProtractor.description: When true, the protractor dependency and e2e directory will be removed from the project
removeProtractor.x-prompt: Would you like to remove Protractor from the project?

addCypressTestScript.description: When true, Cypress test script will be added to package.json
addCypressTestScript.x-prompt: Would you like to add Cypress test script to package.json?

noBuilder.description: When true, the angular.json file will not be modified to add cypress commands, requiring the user to run cypress from the command line independent of the Angular CLI
